eu.fbk.rdfpro

Class RuleEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.rdfpro.RuleEngine

  • public abstract class RuleEngine
extends Object
    Rule engine abstraction.

    Implementation note: concrete rule engine implementations should extend this abstract class and implement one or both methods #doEval(QuadModel) and #doEval(RDFHandler).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected RuleEngine(Ruleset ruleset)
      Creates a new RuleEngine using the Ruleset specified.

      Internal method called by #eval(QuadModel).
      protected org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandler doEval(org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandler handler, boolean deduplicate)
      Internal method called by #eval(RDFHandler).

      Evaluates rules on the QuadModel specified.

      Evaluates rules in streaming mode, emitting resulting statements to the RDFHandler supplied.
      Ruleset getRuleset()

    • Constructor Detail

      • RuleEngine

        protected RuleEngine(Ruleset ruleset)
        Creates a new RuleEngine using the Ruleset specified. The ruleset must not contain unsafe rules.
        Parameters:
        ruleset - the ruleset, not null and without unsafe rules

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static RuleEngine create(Ruleset ruleset)
        Factory method for creating a new RuleEngine using the Ruleset specified. The ruleset must not contain unsafe rules. The engine implementation instantiated is based on the value of configuration property rdfpro.rules.implementation, which contains the qualified name of a concrete class extending abstract class RuleEngine.
        Parameters:
        ruleset - the ruleset, not null and without unsafe rules
        Returns:
        the created rule engine

      • getRuleset

        public final Ruleset getRuleset()
        Returns the ruleset applied by this engine
        Returns:
        the ruleset

      • eval

        public final void eval(Collection<org.openrdf.model.Statement> model)
        Evaluates rules on the QuadModel specified.
        Parameters:
        model - the model the engine will operate on

      • eval

        public final org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandler eval(org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandler handler,
                                             boolean deduplicate)
        Evaluates rules in streaming mode, emitting resulting statements to the RDFHandler supplied.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler where to emit resulting statements
        deduplicate - true if the output should not contain duplicate statements
        Returns:
        an RDFHandler where input statements can be streamed into

      • doEval

        protected void doEval(Collection<org.openrdf.model.Statement> model)
        Internal method called by #eval(QuadModel). Its base implementation delegates to #doEval(RDFHandler).
        Parameters:
        model - the model to operate on

      • doEval

        protected org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandler doEval(org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandler handler,
                                            boolean deduplicate)
        Internal method called by #eval(RDFHandler). Its base implementation delegates to #doEval(QuadModel).
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler where to emit resulting statements
        deduplicate - true if output should not contain duplicate statements
        Returns:
        an handler accepting input statements
